page.title: 19GARDEN PLANTS:NORTH NORFOLK
page.content: There are also within easy reach, several garden centres and many plants are acpuired from this source. {GARDEN PLANTS:NORTH NORFOLK COAST Considering the area is very exposed, it is surprising the number of unusual and somewhat exotic plants cultivated. We saw many varieties of lily, shrubs such as Ceanothus,Camellia,Pieris and Fremontia as well as many of the more ordinary garden flowers.We also saw Crinum,Schitzostylis,and Nerine all relatively tender,being grown in areas sheltered from the wind.No doubt if the gardner can provide a suitable windbreak he can take advantage of the comparative lack of frost.Many gardens make a valuable contribution to the family budget,providing potatoes,peas, beans and cabbage and in some cases, tomatoes, cucumbers and peppers from the greenhouse.
